titleStmt.title: A supplement to the new version of Psalms by N. Tate and N. Brady. Containing, I. The usual hymns, creed, Lord's Prayer, Ten Commandments, all set to their proper tunes, with additional hymns for the holy sacrament, &c. II. Select psalms in particular measures to supply the whole variety of metres that are in the old version, with duplicates to most of them, and Gloria Patris, and the proper tune for each metre. III. A set of tunes for the foresaid new version of the Psalms.

A supplement to the new version of Psalms by N. Tate and N. Brady. Containing, I. The usual hymns, creed, Lord's Prayer, Ten Commandments, all set to their proper tunes, with additional hymns for the holy sacrament, &c. II. Select psalms in particular measures to supply the whole variety of metres that are in the old version, with duplicates to most of them, and Gloria Patris, and the proper tune for each metre. III. A set of tunes for the foresaid new version of the Psalms.
titleStmt.author: Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.
Brady, Nicholas, 1659-1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Heptinstall, and sold by D. Brown, ..., J. Wild, ... and most booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Advertisement for the Supplement precedes title page.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

The usual hymns &c. to the proper tunes -- Psalms done in particular measures to make up the whole variety of metres that are in the old version, with their proper tunes -- The usual tunes for Psalms of common measure -- The tunes for Psalms of particular measures most usually sung.
